Text:
Oops sorry I forgot the track list in the description
1. Entre Olas (rumba)
2. Panaderos (castillian dance)
3. Cubanita (danza cubana)
4. Gorrion (bolero rumba)
5. De Totana (tarantas)
6. Patio Gitano (bulerias)
7. Alcaiceria (Granainas)
8. Luna Y Clavel (farruca)
9. Romance Flamenco (traditional)
10. Bailando (Sevillanas)

All songs except 2 and 9 composed by Juan Serrano.
Juan Serrano, guitar
Leng Widjaja, 2nd guitar
Steven Schick, percussion
